description: When the breast slips out of the bra cup.

examples.chinese: 求推荐内衣,不空杯不跑杯不勒肉
examples.translation: Looking for bra recommendations, no gap, no slipping, no digging in

examples.chinese: 运动锻炼的时候穿也不容易跑杯,入股不亏
examples.translation: Doesn't slip easily even when exercising, worth buying

examples.chinese: 特别好穿内衣,固定杯垫,不移位不跑杯
examples.translation: Very comfortable underwear, fixed pads, doesn't shift or slip
